name: Global Game Jam 2018 - Watt's Up
description:
This game was made during the Jan 2018 Global Game Jam, with the theme being Transmission.

You play as Watt who wants to get to the next open outlet to recharge. Help Watt get there by jumping over obstacles and teleport through kitchen appliances, while avoiding water.

Credits:

Programmers: Dan Macknowski and Kevin Krause

Character Art and Sprite: Andrew Mescall

Backgrounds and Appliances: Dan Macknowski

Music and Sound: Alyssa Menes and Andrew Mescall
